descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 15 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
# Version 3.1  
A new set of puzzles has been added, along with various gameplay enhancements to improve immersion and overall experience. Dive into detailed environments and enjoy a smoother, more engaging puzzle session.

# Version 3.0  
Based on your feedback, we’ve improved gameplay mechanics, added new puzzles, and optimized performance for a more fluid and satisfying experience.

# Oasis Puzzles  
Explore the enchanting world of Oasis Puzzles, a game that offers a soothing and visually delightful experience. Each puzzle is carefully crafted, immersing you in a realm of tranquility and beauty.

# Play with Your Hands!  
Experience a more natural and intuitive way to solve puzzles with our hand tracking feature. Interact directly with the puzzles using your hands — no controllers needed — for a more realistic and immersive gameplay experience.

Oasis Puzzles is an AR version of the original game, with augmented reality as its defining feature. Exclusive content and features are coming soon.

# Oasis Puzzles  
Explore the enchanting world of Oasis Puzzles, a game that offers a soothing and visually delightful experience. Each puzzle is carefully crafted, immersing you in a realm of tranquility and beauty.

Experience a more natural and intuitive way to solve puzzles with our hand tracking feature. Interact directly with the puzzles using your hands — no controllers needed — for a more realistic and immersive gameplay experience.
